job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
ActiveLogic Labs designs and develops custom web-based and mobile software applications for a myriad of different industries and in several different technologies. We’re looking for experienced and versatile software engineers who aren’t afraid of working as a team, exploring new technologies, and pushing their personal skills to their full potential.
What’s in it for you?
Salary range $80k - $130k (Depending on skill & experience)
Competitive total compensation package
Full Benefits, 50% of Medical premiums paid for by company
Company paid Disability and Life insurance
Flexible schedule & work location
Locally owned, friendly, fun atmosphere
Technical Qualifications & Skills
We’re not worried about whether your experience is perfectly aligned with everything we use but more that you want to learn and bring your experience building solid applications. Here are some of the things we do:
Front-End Web Tech
CSS/HTML (SCSS, Webpack)
Bootstrap
Vue.JS
React
Javascript / JQuery
Angular
Back-End Web Tech
PHP / Laravel / Symphony
.NET / C#
Javascript / NodeJS / Express
Lower-Level Tech
Python
C / C++
Java
Required Qualifications:
3+ Years of professional development experience (School work does not count)
GIT Source Control (Pull Requests, Code Reviews)
Relational Database Experience (MySql, SQL, Postgres)
Dependency Management (Composer, NPM, Webpack, Bower)
